title: Transfer window: Top 10 most expensive Premier League deals in January 2018
description: What were the top 10 most expensive January 2018 transfer window deals in the Premier League? Read on to find out...
content: While there was huge attention on the high-profile Alexis Sanchez-Henrikh Mkhitaryan swap deal, there were also vast sums spent by - and received by - Premier League clubs.Here, we pick out the top 10 most expensive transfers...
